General.Name: Aofu Environmental Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Aofu Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of ceramic products in China and internationally. The company provides SCR, DOC, and DPF commercial vehicle catalyst carriers; and VOC treatment equipment used in energy conservation, environmental protection, and other fields. It also offers honeycomb ceramic carriers used in heavy-duty diesel vehicles. Aofu Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Dezhou, China.
